document_data.name: Protection From Magic, 5' Radius
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from magic, 5' radius''''' was a powerful [[spell]] used by the [[Red Wizards of Thay]].
document_data.Effects: This spell protected the caster from all forms of magic. It created a small area of protection around the caster, 5 feet (1.5 meters) in radius. This protected area moved with the caster. If a magical item entered the protected area, it was drained of its magical properties.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
